subject: Mock objects in JUnit 4.5 vs. 4.4
msgSnippet: Hi, Are there any changes between 4.4 and 4.5 in regards to Mock objects? I am updating at work and I am seeing some tests that use mock objects pass in 4.4

Hi,

Are there any changes between 4.4 and 4.5 in regards to Mock objects?
=

I am updating at work and I am seeing some tests that use mock objects
pas=
s in 4.4 and now fail in 4.5.  In one case I found that a class
that had on=
e method mocked was using the real method in 4.4 (which
seems wrong) and wa=
s using the mocked method in 4.5 (which seems right).

That is, it seems as=
 if a bug was fixed from 4.4 to 4.5.

I fixed that one test of ours and now=
 I am looking at a few others for
similar situations.  I am mostly just cur=
ious.  Thanks.

--- Patrick
